W

waitForOtherThreads(WaitingCondition, long, TimeUnit) - Method in class org.cambillaum.concurrencyutils.testing.ConcurrentTester
Sets a WaitingCondition point where runnables invoking waitForOtherThreads on the same WaitingCondition have to wait for each other for at least the amount of time defined by the given timeout before continuing processing.
waitForOtherThreads(WaitingCondition) - Method in class org.cambillaum.concurrencyutils.testing.ConcurrentTester
Sets a WaitingCondition point where runnables invoking waitForOtherThreads on the same WaitingCondition have to wait for each other before continuing processing.
WaitingCondition - Class in org.cambillaum.concurrencyutils.testing
A condition on which several runnables can wait for each other.
WaitingCondition(int) - Constructor for class org.cambillaum.concurrencyutils.testing.WaitingCondition
Constructs a WaitingCondition that will make calling threads wait until the given number of calls is reached.
